text: The women's 182 + 364 + 546 + 728 medley relay event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 9 March in Madrid. The first athlete ran one lap of the 182-metre track, the second two, the third three and the anchor four, thus 10 laps or 1820 metres in total. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Liliya Tkachenko Vera Popkova Nadezhda Syeropegina Anna Zimina || 4:28.4 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Eva Putnová Vlasta Seifertová Libuše Macounová Emilie Ovadková || 4:39.0 || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1968 European Indoor Games – Women's medley relay
